note.p: Irish. Daughter of Edmond Eyre, shopkeeper, and his wife Margaret of Shanagolden, county Limerick, Ireland. Sister of John Joseph Eyre, physician.
Ireland, civil death record (Rootsireland.ie, accessed 13 November 2019)
National Library of Ireland, Catholic parish registers: Shanagolden, microfilm 02418/04 (Rootsireland.ie, accessed 13 November 2019)
